name: in bed, can't sleep
description:
a short narrative game about being on your phone in bed, not being able to fall asleep

assets used:

  • https://yadu.itch.io/mini-loops
  • https://shapeforms.itch.io/cassette
  • https://sound-of-essen.itch.io/sound-effects-reptiles-and-more
  • https://squishisprite.itch.io/ocean-sfx
